dict.acceptation: 内心的，精神的，思想的，心理的；智慧的，智[脑]力的；〈口〉精神病的，意志薄弱的，愚笨的；

sent.orig: Agree with this photograph, mental work has character, namely specific mental work and abstract mental work.
sent.trans: 与此相一致，脑力劳动有二重性，即具体脑力劳动和抽象脑力劳动。

sent.orig: Its disciplinary characteristics include: multi-mental involvement gradual development of mental activity, the dynamic of mental involvement.
sent.trans: 其学科特征包括：多种思维方式的共同参与；思维由低级向高级发展；多层次思维是动态开放的思维。

sent.orig: To prevent unlimited expansion of mental damage system, the certain restrictions of mental damage is inevitable.
sent.trans: 为防止对受害人精神利益的保护无限扩大，对违约精神损害赔偿进行一定的限制也是不可避免的。

sent.orig: The second chapter describes the mental health standards and mental health standards.
sent.trans: 第二章，介绍了心理健康的标准及大学生心理健康的标准。

sent.orig: Compeer mental tutorship is a kind of school mental health education model.
sent.trans: 朋辈心理辅导是一种学校心理健康教育模式。
